p: Membrane disruption in CNB oil treated RSY150 cells was assessed as leakage of cellular contents (OD 600 = 260 nm) in the supernatant [ 43]. The amount of leaked cellular content increased as a function of CNB oil concentration, from 1/8 MIC to MIC (Fig. 1d), showing that compromised cell membrane integrity is dose dependent. The positive control amphotericin B showed leakage at MIC.
